lead_paragraph: Paul Nungesser said the university actively supported a public harassment campaign against him by his accuser, Emma Sulkowicz, who drew national attention when she carried a mattress around campus.

headline.print_headline: Accused of Rape, a Student Sues Columbia Over Bias
headline.main: Accused of Rape, a Student Sues Columbia Over Bias

snippet: Paul Nungesser said the university actively supported a public harassment campaign against him by his accuser, Emma Sulkowicz, who drew national attention when she carried a mattress around campus.
abstract: Paul Nungesser, Columbia University student who was accused of rape by fellow student Emma Sulkowicz, files federal discrimination suit against school; claims he was victim of harassment campaign by her, even though he was cleared of responsibility by university in rape claim.
